version_description:
Introducing The Nordy Club! Our new rewards program lets you earn Notes at a faster earn rate, and gives you access to personalized services and experiences.

Please keep sharing which app experiences are important to you at http://nordstrom.uservoice.com.

• Find unique holiday gifts for Christmas, Hanukkah, parties and all occasions for women, men and kids!
• Various bug fixes and improvements, making the app even faster.

Anniversary Sale is coming soon! Update your app so you're ready to shop our biggest sale of the year.

Did you notice our new logo? We were inspired by the Nordstrom logo from the 1930s and reimagined it for today.

Closets are full. Delivery people are relaxing. Anniversary Sale 2019 is in the books. We hope you enjoyed our biggest event of the year!

Let us know what updates you're looking for at http://nordstrom.uservoice.com.
